title: VPW: Anpassung Storno und Terminverschiebung C4
description:
Description
 UserStory 
 As Support
 I want to change the behaviour of cancellation for VPW in C4
 so that the cancellation order will be processed directly after the message arrives
and not <Welches Problem/Fehlverhalten soll behoben werden?>
